channel.title: Soul-Xile [Pk Server]
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://soul-xile.com/vb/images/bluefox/misc/logo.gif[/img]
Features Flawless Combat Clipped Following Clipped Combat following i forgot what item models but 565+ item models 2 Custom interfaces Ancient Curses Re Wrote combat system Oldschool Gameframe Cacke Szie is around 10-18kb Soulsplit Base
Time for some Picture[/CENTER]
Login [IMG]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/1562/0a52cbc8419b4deba9499a8.png[/img]
Our pk shop with some newer item models.... [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/5511/95de6ccbf3ce4d75a0425b4.png[/img]
Level Tab [IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/3416/93ce8e76ca1442a58a98830.png[/img]
Spawn tab [IMG]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/6361/f046ffc8afe74002b96c477.png[/img] [/CENTER]
Note:This is my first server that i ever coded myself.
This is all i got so far....Beta will be up as soon as i finish up the minor stuff...and make the forums...
Credits: Warren Soulsplit Forgot who ever made the level tab interface rune-server for tuts and guidence.
Ps if somoene can make ma better logo or a "i support soul-xile" logo i would greatly appriate it.
